text: eya hangumbara awasthawak wu bawa madhya wartha kara thibini.
ee sathuta mata thiyenawa.
sagaraya padanam karagath sanwardhanaya nila kiyala kiyanne.
in ehata deyak man me welawe kiyanne naha.
ee samangama ayata nobo dinakadi siya samiya gayantha kala anathuru angawimak

kese wethath thamage menma siya daruwageth anagathaya randa pawathinne thaman methan sita jiwithayata muhunadena aakaraya anuwa bawa wataha ganna aya prathamayenma thama gewaththe wu kos, pol, kesel aadiya genagos mirissa pola bhumiye welandam kirima aarambha kalaya.

wanodyanawala sancharaka niwahan amathige namin nomile wen karawagena jagath kanaharaaarachchi yala, wilpaththuwa, udawalawa saha hortanthanna wanodyanawala athi sancharaka niwahanwalata wadima illuma athi desambar masayedi wanajiwi ha gowijana sewa niyojya amathi es.
parwarish (1958) chithrapataye mukesh gayana kala githayaka thanuwak anuwayi ee githaya gayana kale.
mema awasthawata dakshina sanwardhana adhikariye sabhapathi shirantha herath mahathada sahabhagi wiya.
batahirayan salakanne thama sanskruthiya aarthikaya deshapalanaya rakaganimata, wardhanaya kirimata katayuthu karannanta pamanak bawa amathaka karanna epa.
na kiyala kiyanna man oluwa wanuwa.
ee asse rajakadu nadagama....mame....ayi..ayi..ayi me kolawari di ?

wardhanaya yukthiya washayen ganima wenuwata, sadharanathwaya yanu duppathkama nathi kirima wenuwata pohosathun wime kadarakama nawathalima wiya yuthu yayi gathahoth aarthika wardhanaya sadharanathwaya itu karanu atha,

mema kramaya bhawitha karamin kridakayange dawiyam thindu kirimata a.do. lakshayaka pamana mudalak wayawana bawinda ee sandaha anugrahakayeku idiripath wi nomathi nisada eya kriyathmaka nowe.eheth loka kusalana krikat tharagawaliye di rupawahini punarupana matha dawiyam thindu kirime kramaya kriyathmaka kirimata piyawara gena atha..
kese wethath thewani watayedi ethek tharagaye peramuna gena siti senna suleyiman nur pasukara idiriyata eemata eshan samath wuye warshawa madhyayeya.
owuhu anagathaya atha daragena sitithi.
karanna deyak nathi thana mama sumanadasa kiyapu widiyata sale athulata awidagena yaddi mama dakka anik kamara athare saleta mehayin thibba dora reddakuth dala wahala thibba kamarayak.
mita kalin mehe awilla nathuwada manda.
eekatama gapenna tharu penna liyala thiyenawa.
menna me gothirka gathi hara dala.
shri lanka nidahas pakshaya aarambha wune 1951 wasarediya.
bohoma sthuthiyi danumata yamak eka kalata.

thamanta athi siyaluma gatalu lagama pihiti hamuda kandawura wetha idiripath kota sahanayak labaganna lesath, oonama dukganawillak yuda hamudawa wetha idiripath kala haki bawath ohu janathawata danum di atha.

thawamath mawupiyan asurehima hadi wadena ewani tharuna pirisa tharuniyakagen labena wisekara lingika athdakimakata wada wayasin wadimahalu gahaniyaka asurehi labana athdakima priyakaranawa wiya hakiya.

nannadunana sihine alkohol horu ........ma dutu nidahasa............ ..............

meya lokaye muhudu aahara sapayana ratawal atharada dewani thanagani.
danma ee balaporoththuwa itu karaganna adahasak naha.."

malli, idiriyatath me wage karunu karana danaganna labewi...

mahinda rajapaksha palana yugaye di sidu wu aakarayatama widwathun ha kalakaruwan pirisak rajaye ga්rahanayata nathu kara gena owun haraha janathawa mula kirimata katayuthu kala aakarayen ma mema siwil sanwidhana niyojithayan da ada wana wita wathman rajaya wenuwen kondesi wirahithawa peni siti.

upan da sita daka athi swabhawa dharmaye samanya prapanchayak wana widuliya ketimak pawa, awashya karana mulawe niyama mathrawa thula mohanayata path wu wita, budu ras washayen dakinnata tharam, me sadahawaththu eda pinwath wuha.dewani dawase (pasu giya 8 wanida) uthsawayata da laksha ganan bathimaththu somawathiyata ras wuha.

adala kanthawakage anekuth roga thaththwayan aadiya salaka bala nawatha hormona labadime wasi-awasi da mana balimen pasu yamekuta nawatha hormona labadima sudusuyayi waidyawarayeku wisin thiranaya kala yuthuya.
mewara janadhipathiwaranaya itha thiranathmaka saha siyum ekak wanne eheyinya.
athamita saru aya pamanak noweyi, eda wela hamba kara ganna kamkaruwan pawa haki pamanin aadhara kala.
agamathithumage aya kiyanawa naw gaththa banath, adwatayisin karana duwath, nayit klab kudu karapu puthath hire danna oona kiyala.
enamuth, adu wayasa’thi kanthawanta wada wadi wayasa’thi kanthawanta garbhani bhawayedi gatalu sahagatha bawak saha wanda bhawaya athiwimata wadi idakadak pawathi.
milagata wadagath wanne kama ganna piliwelayi.
